ch0091_00_shirona/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You look like you’re ready for some fun today.
ch0091_00_shirona/0101_0701_02_10:
What do you say we use that energy to
go find a battle or two!
ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0701_01_10:
Different Trainers have different feelings
and approaches when it comes to
Pokémon battling.
ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0701_02_10:
Our Pokémon are on the receiving end of those
feelings, and they fight for us wholeheartedly.
ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0701_03_10:
So in a sense, watching a Pokémon while
it’s battling can actually tell you a lot about
its Trainer, too.
ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0702_01_10:
When you and your Pokémon are battling
together, you two always look like you’re
having so much fun.
ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0702_02_10: It’s part of why I love battling with you.
ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0702_03_10:
It’s easy to pour all your energy into something
if you’re having a great time doing it.
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_01_10:
A mysterious power drew us to this place...
But I wonder what influenced its creation.
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_02_10:
There are all sorts of diverse locations here, 
aren’t there?
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_03_10:
Pasio may be a man-made island,
but I think it’s been influenced by the
mythology of other regions.
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_04_10:
There’s so much to see here that it’s
hard to pick where to explore next.
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0702_01_10:
I’ve got a report I need to finish, but a little
swimming at the beach sounds kind of nice, too.
I did bring a bathing suit, after all...
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0702_02_10:
Oh! Don’t mind me. I’m just talking to
myself over here!
ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0702_03_10:
There’s so much variety here on Pasio. The
creator must really have a mind for hospitality,
assuming all of this was a conscious decision.
ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0701_01_10:
There’s an ancient cave painting in
my hometown. It’s what first sparked my
interest in studying ancient mythology.
ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0701_02_10:
The artwork portrays an old Sinnoh legend.
It’s quite an impressive sight.
ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0701_03_10:
It’s a little out of the way, but I think it would
be worth the trip to Celestic Town to see it next
time you visit the Sinnoh region.
ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0702_01_10:
It’s a lot colder in Sinnoh than it is here on
Pasio. Remember to bring a coat when you visit!
ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0702_02_10:
I’m so used to the colder climate there that
places like Hoenn and Alola feel too warm.
ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0701_01_10:
All of my Pokémon are amazing, but
Garchomp is definitely the ace of my team.
ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0701_02_10:
Maybe that’s why she’s been such a ball
of energy ever since we got to Pasio.
ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0701_03_10:
It’s up to me to channel all of that energy
and make the most out of it in a battle.
ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0702_01_10:
Back when she was a Gible, she’d gnaw on
fabric, books, and even tables! It was a pain to
deal with at the time, but she was just so cute...
ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0702_02_10:
Thinking back on those days always makes
me laugh. She used to be such a naughty thing,
but look at her now! My brilliant ace.
ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0701_01_10:
I’m the person I am today because of
everything I’ve seen and experienced
up until now...
ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0701_02_10:
which means that who we are and
what we do today is going to change
who we will be in the future.
ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0701_03_10:
So I say live life to the fullest! Let’s make sure we
can look back on our pasts with a smile someday.
ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0702_01_10:
Hmm... It’s kind of hard to sum up my past
in only a few words...
ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0702_02_10:
but it’s a life I’ve built together with my
Pokémon, so one thing I can say for sure
is that it’s amazing!
ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey, I wanted to give you this.
Do you think you can use it?
ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0701_02_10:
I don’t really need it, but I didn’t want it
to go to waste, either. Will you take it?
ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0702_01_10:
If I don’t get rid of the things I’m not using,
my room gets out of hand pretty quickly...
ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0702_02_10:
I mean, um, forget what I just said!
Let’s just keep that between you and me, OK?
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_01_10:
Being in a place that was created just for
Trainers is so exhilarating, isn’t it?
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_02_10:
Maybe it’s all the enthusiasm in the air
with so many Trainers and Pokémon
milling about.
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_03_10:
A lot of my friends and colleagues
have gathered here, all in one place.
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_04_10:
We’ll have to stay on our toes if we
don’t want to lose!
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_01_10:
Interacting with other Trainers and getting to
know each other is so important—especially
since we’re all competitors in the end.
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_02_10:
The other day, I had a lovely time with
Caitlin and a few other Trainers at the
café where we went for a cup of tea...
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_03_10:
Oh! And there’s an amazing cake shop
nearby as well! What else...
ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_04_10:
Hm? What’s that smirk for?
You don’t think I spend ALL my time
prancing around eating cake, do you?
ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0701_01_10:
If you raise your Pokémon with love and
kindness, it will return those feelings.
ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon are like my best friends—
we’ve been journeying and battling together
from the very beginning.
ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0701_03_10:
I have absolute confidence in their abilities
because of all the time we’ve spent together.
ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0702_01_10:
You believe in your Pokémon and your team,
and your Pokémon knows it! That’s probably
where it gets a lot of its strength.
ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0702_02_10:
After all, being relied upon by others often
motivates us to try even harder. Your Pokémon
wants to do its very best for you!
ch0091_00_shirona/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning!
You look like you’re in a good mood. You must
be doing well if you’re up and about this early!
ch0091_00_shirona/3002_0701_01_10:
Good morning.
Are you all set for today? I’m looking forward
to exploring some new mysteries with you.
ch0091_00_shirona/3003_0701_01_10:
I started doing some research on this island,
and before I knew it, it was lunchtime!
The more I learn, the more curious I get.
ch0091_00_shirona/3004_0701_01_10:
Phew, I just finished organizing all of my
research materials. I think I’m ready to go
blow off some steam now.
ch0091_00_shirona/3005_0701_01_10:
It looks like the sun’s gone down.
What an enchanting time to go on a stroll!
ch0091_00_shirona/3006_0701_01_10:
Great myths have been passed down throughout
history by the light of a campfire.
